pullrequest.title: Add light as child of link

content.raw: Little detail: if I pause the world and change the pose of the light, it stays in that position until I press play and it snaps back to the link. This behaviour is inconsistent with other "immovable" entities, such as links - i.e. it is not allowed to manipulate a single link on the GUI.
